Example

```{r}
new_mean <- function(x){
	n <- length(x)
	mean_val <- sum(x)/n
	return(mean_val)
}
new_mean(x=c(100,200,300))
```

Exercise : x^2

```{r}
sqr <- function(x){
	sqr_val <- x^2
	return(sqr_val)
}
sqr(x=c(100,9899))
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
